ValidationRule.description: Ensures Parent Configuration and Parent Relationship Name are both populated if one is.
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: OR( AND( NOT( ISBLANK( nFORCE__Parent_Configuration__c ) ) , ISBLANK( nFORCE__Parent_Relationship_Name__c ) ) , AND( NOT( ISBLANK( nFORCE__Parent_Relationship_Name__c ) ) , ISBLANK( nFORCE__Parent_Configuration__c ) ) )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Parent Configuration and Parent Relationship Name must both be set.
